title: The Red Room
author: Le Queux, William
snippet: "Ach, sir!" he exclaimed; "I thought perhaps you had left!  I'm very glad you are still here!  A most curious circumstance occurred this afternoon when I went off duty as usual from three till five. I live in Forth Street, at the back of the Theatre Royal, and while walking towards home along Broughton Street, I came face to face with the gentleman for whom you are searching."

title: The journal of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: merely her look but her nature was changed: evenings they have spent at 29 Forth Street,
